/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Nav from '../components/Nav' import bgImg from '../Assets/Images/bg.png' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function Vandetails() { const [vanDetail, setVanDetail]= useState({}); const id = useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ fetch( "http://localhost:3000/vans/"+id.id) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setVanDetail(data)) console.log(vanDetail); },[]) return ( <>

{vanDetail.type}

{vanDetail.name}

$60/day

The Modest Explorer is a van designed to get you out of the house and into nature. This beauty is equipped with solar panels, a composting toilet, a water tank and kitchenette. The idea is that you can pack up your home and escape for a weekend or even longer!

Rent This Van
) } export default Vandetails
